Author: Basty_ss
Summary: Powershell script to download Azure EA billing data to CSV.This uses the new API downloading data from the new URL https://consumption.azure.com/v3/enrollmentsCredit goes to the script based on the old API found at http://www.redbaronofazure.com/?p=631Requres 5 mandatory paramete
Title: Azure EA Billing Data Export to CSV
